name: The Calm (Silas Bartha)
description:
This game was created as my 11th grade computer science ISP. It is a survival game prototype, with:

  •  A wave-based spawning system.
  •  3 unique enemy types, as well as a boss enemy. 
  • Resource collection
  • Inventory management
  • Crafting
  • Unique system for melee player attacks
  • Ranged player attacks
  • Block placement / destruction 

I hope to expand upon the features quite heavily in the future, and any donations help to buy coffee to keep me going.

The source code can also be accessed here: Github Repository
